code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useRefresh}from'../context/RefreshContext';import{useUserContext}from'../context/UserContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventList=()=>{const[events,setEventList]=useState([]);const{refreshEventList,setRefreshEventList}=useRefresh();const{UserId}=useUserContext();console.log("Eventlist",events);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/api/getevents').then(response=>{setEventList(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching event list:',error);});},[refreshEventList,setRefreshEventList]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"eventlistmain",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"explore",children:"Explore Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"eventlist",children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"eventitem card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"eventhead",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"eventtitle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:event.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"joined",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"data:image/png;base64,"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:event.joined>0?event.joined:0})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"eventmid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Category: ",event.category]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Location: ",event.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Date: ",event.date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Time: ",event.startTime," - ",event.endTime]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"desc",children:["Description: ",event.description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Attendees: ",event.attendees]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Organizer: ",event.organizerName]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:event.organizer===UserId?'Organized':'Join'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"moreinfobtn",children:"More Info"})]})]},event._id))})]});};export default EventList;
